    • Constructor Detail

      • CreateCoordinatesTask

        public CreateCoordinatesTask(int h,
                     int w,
                     byte[] imageBytes,
                     int rowsBefore,
                     int currentGap,
                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> colorList)
        Instantiates a new creates the coordinates task. Reads given byte of pixels, compares colors to given colorlist and if found saves as Point.
        Parameters:
        h - the height of image composed from bytes
        w - the width of image
        imageBytes - the image bytes
        rowsBefore - the rows before this part of image
        currentGap - the current gap
        colorList - the color list

      • calculateCoordinates

        private void calculateCoordinates()
        Goes trough the pixels of original image and checks is the color found from colorList. If found -> coordinate of pixel saved to list.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • hasCellColor

        private boolean hasCellColor(int r,
                   int c,
                   int w)
        Checks is color at image position found from colorList. The color value is reduced
        Parameters:
        r - the row
        c - the column
        w - the width of image
        Returns:
        true, if found the color

        private boolean foundColor(int colorInt)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Finds colors from colorList collections using binary search.
        Parameters:
        colorInt - the color int
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:

      • getReducedNoiseColor

        private java.lang.Integer getReducedNoiseColor(int colorInt)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the reduced noise color. R educes to every tenth value for example 30 , 50 ,100, 110, etc. Checks that each color channel value is between 0-250.
        Parameters:
        colorInt - the color as Integer
        Returns:
        the reduced noise color as Integer
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • checkOverBounds

        private int checkOverBounds(int colorValue)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks over bounds of color values. The range should be inside 0-255.
        Parameters:
        colorValue - the color value
        Returns:
        the int
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
